Translations.Text: veiz nada rabbuke musa eni-'ti-lkavme-zzalimin
kavme fir`avn. ela yettekun
kale rabbi inni ehafu ey yukezzibun
veyediku sadri vela yentaliku lisani feersil ila harun
velehum `aleyye zembun feehafu ey yaktulun
kale kella. fezheba biayatina inna me`akum mustemi`un
fe'tiya fir`avne fekula inna rasulu rabbi-l`alemin
en ersil me`ana beni israil
kale elem nurabbike fina velidev velebiste fina min `umurike sinin
vefe`alte fa`leteke-lleti fe`alte veente mine-lkafirin
kale fe`altuha izev veena mine-ddallin
feferartu minkum lemma hiftukum fevehebe li rabbi hukmev vece`aleni mine-lmurselin
vetilke ni`metun temunnuha `aleyye en `abbette beni israil
kale fir`avnu vema rabbu-l`alemin
kale rabbu-ssemavati vel'ardi vema beynehuma. in kuntum mukinin
kale limen havlehu ela testemi`un
kale rabbukum verabbu abaikumu-l'evvelin
kale inne rasulekumu-llezi ursile ileykum lemecnun
kale rabbu-lmesriki velmagribi vema beynehuma. in kuntum ta`kilun
kale leini-ttehazte ilahen gayri leec`alenneke mine-lmescunin
kale evelev ci'tuke bisey'im mubin
kale fe'ti bihi in kunte mine-ssadikin
feelka `asahu feiza hiye su`banum mubin
veneza`a yedehu feiza hiye beydau linnazirin
